name: Nirog
description:
This game is developed as part of CSR initiatives for the district of East Singhbhum and nearby areas. Anyone can play and enjoy it.

You are presented with various situations and you make decisions to cross levels. Choose the correct options to progress. Pay attention to what "HudHud" says. He will help you win the game. 

The game also contains a couple of mini games where you use gun and mask to kill the enemies. 

Enjoy this hybrid mix in one of a kind simple to play game. Please provide feedback and share if you like the game.

For any queries or assistance please mail us at support@flyingantsstudios.com

Developed by Flying Ants Studios and Jaguar Creatives for East Singhbhum, Jharkhand Government.
